abilities.name: Ogryn Bodyguard
abilities.rule: While one or more **OFFICER** models are in the same unit as this model, those **OFFICER** models have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

abilities.name: Thunderous Head-butt
abilities.rule: Each time this model’s unit is selected to fight, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model and roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.
